xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
Class TId

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.TId

public class TId
extends java.lang.Object

This class is just a simple wrapping of the id Object and a recordNr. So, this is used for a unique identifyer inside a RecordManager. Id represents the ID of the Page in the underlying container of the strategy and recordId is the position of the record in the surrounding page.

Method Detail

getConverter

public static FixedSizeConverter getConverter(FixedSizeConverter idConverter)
Constructs a converter for the ids generated by this container. A converter transforms an TId-Object to its byte representation and vice versa.

Parameters:
idConverter - The converter used for converting the identifyer part of the TId.
Returns:
The converter for the TId.

hashCode

public int hashCode()
Returns a hash code for the TId. This is important if you use a TIds inside a map. The implementation computes the XOR value of the hashCode of the id and the recordNr.

Overrides:
hashCode in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
integer value.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
Return true, if this Object is equal to the given Object o. False otherwise. If the given Object o isn't from the class TId, false will be returned.
